data.event: The H1N1 swine flu virus has now spread to 66 different countries throughout the globe, with at least 19,273 confirmed cases and 117 deaths having been reported according to the latest World Health Organisation (WHO) tally.

event.title: were reported by the United States, which now

data.event: A majority of the cases were reported by the United States, which now has at least 10,053 confirmed infections from the disease.

event.title: weeks is seasonal flu, how much is actually this H1N1 strain, and we will simply have

data.event: She said that "it gives us the tools to monitor how much of the flu in the coming weeks is seasonal flu, how much is actually this H1N1 strain, and we will simply have to keep monitoring that over the coming months."
The health ministry of Brazil announced on Tuesday that the number of infected people in the country has been increased to 23 after two new cases were confirmed.

event.title: were reported in three territories and nine provinces of Canada as of Wednesday

data.event: 1,795 laboratory-confirmed cases of H1N1 were reported in three territories and nine provinces of Canada as of Wednesday.
The federal health minister, Leona Aglukkaq, pledged on Friday to give CA$10.8 million to help fight the flu.

event.title: tested positive for the influenza on Thursday

data.event: Health officials from the Philippines said that seven more people tested positive for the influenza on Thursday, increasing the number of confirmed infections from the disease in the country to 29.

event.title: arrived at Moscow's Sheremetyevo International Airport last Monday

data.event: The man had initially passed a medical check when he arrived at Moscow's Sheremetyevo International Airport last Monday, but began to feel ill two days later and was hospitalised the same day.

data.event: The man had initially passed a medical check when he arrived at Moscow's Sheremetyevo International Airport last Monday, but began to feel ill two days later and was hospitalised the same day.
Turkey's first case happened on May 16 when a passenger flying from United States to Iraq through a connected flight over Turkey entered to İstanbul Atatürk International Airport.

event.title: June 3, the number of confirmed cases increased

data.event: With the latest arrival of 2 Turkish passengers from New York and Toronto on June 3, the number of confirmed cases increased to 10.

The Turkish Ministry of Health reported that no infections related for human-to-human transfer of the virus are observed until now and the hospitalized cases are treated in a dedicated hospital in Istanbul.

data.event: "What is unusual this year is that influenza continues to be widely circulating in Wisconsin and many, many other states this late in the year."
Vietnam's fourth swine flu infection was confirmed on Thursday, in a six-year-old girl in Vietnam's capital of Ho Chi Minh City, a local media report said.
